title: Ticket #4145: concurrency limit off-by-one when use with partitionable slots
description:
If using a processing node with dynamic provisioning enabled, the number of jobs that will be permitted to run is one less than the specified limit. When using the condor_status command to query the ConcurrencyLimits attribute of the partitionable and dynamic slots on a machine with currently running jobs, it is apparent that both kind of slots have this attribute set, despite the fact that the partitionable slot by definition is not running.

This problem does not occur in 8.0.0 or in the 7.8.x series. In those cases, the partitionable slot does not have the ConcurrencyLimits attribute set when running jobs.
